history.text: So, what movie did you see?
Bruce Almighty!
You should definitely give it a try.
Was it any good?
I guess you answered already!
Although it only got a 48% on Rotten Tomatoes, I thought it was pretty funny!
What was it about?

Jim Carrey is the main actor - if you are familiar. It is a comedy about this guy, Bruce, who complains to God because things aren't going great in his life right now. So, God gives him a chance at being God for a week.
Jennifer Aniston is also part of the cast. :)
Carrey is hilarious. I don't know if I trust critics. A lot of great movies get bad reviews.
Jennifer Aniston is hot. Hotter than Anjelina Jolie. I don't know what Brad Pitt was thinking.
I typically trust Rotten Tomatoes. Normally I do enjoy the movies that they give high ratings to. But there have been a bunch of times where I really liked a low rated movie!
LOL
Jennifer Aniston literally does not age. She looks as good as she did when she was on Friends. Maybe even better...
So what does he do as God?
God, played by Morgan Freeman (which I think is great), truly gives Bruce all of his powers. At first he is completely swept up by all of the limitless powers he has and uses them to his advantage.
Morgan Freeman was made to play God. That voice. George Burns wasn't but redefined who God is.
Yes, totally agree!

So, Bruce begins to hear all of these voices in his head. They are prayers from around the world. He is sp overwhelmed by all of the prayers that he creates a prayer email system and just replies "yes" to all of the prayers. lol
Jim Carrey seems to do well with these type of plots. Liar Liar was hilarious. In that movie, he is a liar who suddenly cannot tell a lie. literally.
Ha ha. Prayer email automated reply system!
I completely forgot that that was the plot of Liar Liar! That's funny. Similar concept.
Bruce Almighty was released in 2013 - 15 years ago! I imagine Liar Liar is even older than that.
Yeah, its an old one. So does he save the world at the end or something?
I'll probably check it out, being that I liked Liar Liar.

Not quite :) But he does get it all figured out! He figures out the power of prayer and he himself prays that Jennifer Anistons character will find happiness. In the movie, they are in a relationship but it is complicated and messy.
But through prayer, they find their way back to eachother. They get engaged. They live happily ever after!
Yeah, its a pretty good movie! It is an easy watch.
Ah, messy relationship. "we were on a break!"
Ha!
Essentially, yes.
Easy watches are necessary, I don't think critics get that sometimes.
I don't think so either! Sometimes you just want to have a good laugh.

uid1response.feedback: Movie sound funny and breezy. An easy watch.
